WorkItem.ClosedComment: Duplicate of http://rawr.codeplex.com/workitem/18045Please continue the discussion there.
WorkItem.Description:
Starting with 2.3.17 and also occuring in 2.3.18, I'm seeing RAWR's elemental module suggest I wear 264 T10 over 277 T10. Since I would have 4pc set bonus with either items, and the same enchant and gemming is being used, I don't understand why it is saying that the 264 is higher dps than the 277.
 
This is without the new "Use Fire DPS Totem" checked. Right now, I'm seeing the Helm and Chest behave this way, while Shoulder and Gloves suggest the 277 over 264.
 
Additional Information: 
Rawr v2.3.17 and v2.3.18
Windows 7 RTM

Comments.Message: Sorry, wrong XML file. Here's the elemental file.

The reason is the very strong bump in the haste graph. It is related to the 4t10 bonus and the hasted flame shock. But since the model uses approximated haste values I would suggest going by the common sense and use the item with more sp/haste instead of relying blindly on Rawr. You can check the reason for such irregular behavior in the stats graph.
